Welcome! I'm Fabian, a PhD student at the University of Vienna studying labor and housing economics. 

My primary research interest is macroeconomics with a focus on housing decisions and
occupational choice. I study how fiscal policies and regulations influence individual behavior using
survey-based microdata, and how these responses feed back into aggregate outcomes through
quantitative life-cycle models.

My advisors are [Monika Merz](https://sites.google.com/view/monikamerz){target="_blank"} and [Michael Reiter](https://www.ihs.ac.at/de/personen/michael-reiter/){target="_blank"}.
